Posts.Content: Thanks for the inputs.The doctor said this time the biopsy will be done in the hospital with antibiotic but i still worry about the infection. I wonder if there is a way to do the biopsy with less chance to get an infection. Such as perineum instead of through the rectum
Posts.Title: Should I have another biopsy

Posts.Content: I had a prostate biopsy 3 years ago. It's negative. The biopsy gave me an infection(sepsis).I had a DNA methylation over a year ago because my psa was 8 at that point. It was positive at the right apex. Right After that I had a MRI that was negative. A few weeks ago. I had another PSA test and it's 11. The doctor wants to do another biopsy at the apex where DNA methylation shows positive. Should I have another biopsy. I worry to get another infection from the biopsy. Thanks.
